In a summary invoice case this is the summary invoice. For non-summary invoices this will be the same as the InvoiceAppliedTo field.</description> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Invoice Applied For</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <referenceTo>ccrz__E_Invoice__c</referenceTo> <relationshipLabel>CC Transaction Payments For</relationshipLabel> <relationshipName>TransactionPaymentsFor</relationshipName> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>false</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Lookup</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>ccrz__E_TransactionPayment__c.ccrz__InvoiceAppliedTo__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deleteConstraint>SetNull</deleteConstraint> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <description>Invoice this payment was applied to (optional). This is the invoice that the payment was applied to. In a summary invoice case this will be the child invoice the sub-payment was applied to. For a non-summary case this will be the same as the applied for field.</description> <escapeMarkup>false</escapeMarkup> <externalId>false</externalId> <isAIPredictionField>false</isAIPredictionField> <isConvertLeadDisabled>false</isConvertLeadDisabled> <isFilteringDisabled>false</isFilteringDisabled> <isNameField>false</isNameField> <isSortingDisabled>false</isSortingDisabled> <label>Invoice Applied To</label> <length>0</length> <populateExistingRows>false</populateExistingRows> <precision>0</precision> <referenceTo>ccrz__E_Invoice__c</referenceTo> <relationshipLabel>CC Transaction Payments To</relationshipLabel> <relationshipName>TransactionPaymentsTo</relationshipName> <relationshipOrder>0</relationshipOrder> <reparentableMasterDetail>false</reparentableMasterDetail> <required>false</required> <restrictedAdminField>false</restrictedAdminField> <scale>0</scale> <startingNumber>0</startingNumber> <stripMarkup>false</stripMarkup> <trackFeedHistory>false</trackFeedHistory> <trackHistory>false</trackHistory> <trackTrending>false</trackTrending> <translateData>false</translateData> <type>Lookup</type> <unique>false</unique> <visibleLines>0</visibleLines> <writeRequiresMasterRead>false</writeRequiresMasterRead></CustomField>

toolingEntityParticle.Label: Source Transaction Payment
toolingEntityParticle.Name: ccrz__SourceTransactionPayment__c
toolingEntityParticle.Metadata: <CustomField xmlns="http://soap.sforce.com/2006/04/metadata" > <fullName>ccrz__E_TransactionPayment__c.ccrz__SourceTransactionPayment__c</fullName> <caseSensitive>false</caseSensitive> <deleteConstraint>SetNull</deleteConstraint> <deprecated>false</deprecated> <description>Reference to another transaction payment that was used as the source for this transaction. E.g. in a AUTH, later CAPTURE scenario the AUTH would be the source transaction payment for the CAPTURE.
